### SCENE 05 â€“ Kitchen Meet-Cute  

_Hero slicing onions ðŸ§… rapidly (dangerously). On final slice, Niha enters._

**Hero:** Something entered my house.  
**Gayatri:** Ammaâ€¦ tinu Aadhya.  
**Amma:** Meeru matladuthu undandi.  
**Gayatri:** Oreyâ€¦  
**Niha:** Tammuda..?  
**Gayatri:** Orey **Annaya**.  
**Niha:** Oo.  
**Gayatri:** Ma friend occhindhi ra.  
**Hero:** Ee 6th-class daaniki oo friend? Daanini chusi nenu murisipovaliâ€¦  

_Hero turns, is impressed on seeing her. Amma prepares coffee._

**Gayatri:** Mee house ekkada?  
**Niha:** **Hostel** lo untunnanu; food bagodhu kada, so cook chesukovadam ani groceries kosam market lo.  
**Gayatri:** Aythe neeku veelu ainappudu ma intiki lunch ki ravocchu.  
**Hero (muttering):** Avunu mariâ€¦ idhi vandala saavala!

_Hero bends, shakes Nihaâ€™s hand._

**Niha:** Em chestuntaru?  
_Hero sits slowly._  
**Hero:** **B-Tech** complete ayyindhi.  
**Niha:** Oh! Niceâ€¦  
**Niha:** **M.S, M.Tech** plan chesstunnara?  
**Hero (smooth smile):** Alantidheâ€¦  
**Gayatri:** Annayaâ€¦ monna resultsâ€¦  
**Hero:** Chelli, Amma pilustundhi ninnuâ€¦  
**Gayatri (softly):** Sare.  
**Hero:** Actual ga *script writing, direction* ante interest.  
**Niha:** Oh! Nice.  
_Both smile._
